actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide transportation for employees of Haleakala National Park, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide transportation to and from work, outside of regular work hours, for specified employees of Haleakala National Park, Hawaii.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to provide transportation for employees of Haleakala National Park, and for other purposes.
